execution_plan.description: For every order, retrieve the order id, order status, and the number of distinct products included (include orders with zero items).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status_code, COALESCE(ci.product_count, 0) AS product_count
FROM Orders o
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT order_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS product_count
  FROM Order_Items
  GROUP BY order_id
) ci ON o.order_id = ci.order_id;
